title: Add Men filter suggestions for Shirt / Red / Floral

requirements.text: Update the Men-category search filters UI to explicitly include the values: item type = "Shirt", color = "Red", and pattern = "Floral" as selectable/suggested inputs (so a user can easily run a Men search for a red floral shirt without guessing the exact text).

quotes: under the category men add item type Shirt ,under the color give Red and pattern Floral , add this also

acceptanceCriteria: When the user navigates to the Search page with category set to Men, the UI provides a clear selectable/suggested option for item type "Shirt".
When the user is on the Search page, the UI provides a clear selectable/suggested option for color "Red".
When the user is on the Search page, the UI provides a clear selectable/suggested option for pattern "Floral".
Selecting/entering these values and running the search navigates to Results with itemType=Shirt, color=Red, pattern=Floral populated in the query/search params.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or anything under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing components instead).
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).
nonGoals: Adding new categories beyond the existing Men/Women/Kids/Casual/Bridal set.
Changing backend search behavior or data model (this request is limited to exposing these filter values in the UI).
